channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MO

item.title: Report X-2023081627
item.description:
Report X-2023081627

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-20
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler got some of the cleaner on their skin and it irritated their skin. Looking at the box they noted that it was a corrosive. Opening the box it was noted that a couple of the lids were loose. Not a whole lot of fluid came out but the box was very wet on the bottom DescribePack: two of the lids were loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was put in a plastic lined tote and placed in the hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023081596
item.description:
Report X-2023081596

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box was placed upside down even though it has large wording on the box saying not to do so. The box became wet due to liquid coming through the vented caps DescribePack: small amount came through the vented caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the package was put in a plastic lined tote and placed in the hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023081566
item.description:
Report X-2023081566

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was recovered from the 2-4 Unload and placed in a lined tote. DescribePack: One of the two cans of corrosion resistant epoxy developed a loose lid which allowed for a leak to occur. Both cans were sent without paint clips. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the Hazmat cage on the Flammable Pallet.
